scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @kkma/server" "npm run dev -w @kkma/client"
scripts.dev:single: npm run build -w @kkma/client && npm run dev -w @kkma/server
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build -w @kkma/client && concurrently -n server,client-watch -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @kkma/server" "npm run build:watch -w @kkma/client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @kkma/server && npm run build -w @kkma/client
